alert.note: Alert for Frederick (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 3:58AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Maryland, including the following county: Frederick. * WHEN...Until 745 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 356 AM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Streams and creeks continue to rise even after the steadier and heavier rain has ended. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Frederick... Thurmont... Emmitsburg... Harry Grove Stadium... Ballenger Creek... Walkersville... Braddock Heights... Clover Hill... Discovery-Spring Garden... Linganore-Bartonsville... Point Of Rocks... Adamstown... Buckeystown... Bloomfield... Utica... Clifton... Lewistown... Park Mills... Graceham... Doubs... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
